children.name: an
children.sourceText: Let us go forth to meet my people, without arms; and I swear unto you with an oath that my people shall not slay thy people.

children.name: and
children.sourceText: Let us go forth to meet my people, without arms; and I swear unto you with an oath that my people shall not slay thy people.

children.name: because
children.sourceText: I have broken the oath because thy people did carry away the daughters of my people; therefore, in my anger I did cause my people to come up to war against thy people.

children.name: I
children.sourceText: I have broken the oath because thy people did carry away the daughters of my people; therefore, in my anger I did cause my people to come up to war against thy people.
